trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl"></xref> class instructs the server to return the search result in the specified page size.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl"></xref> class.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl.#ctor(System.Byte[])"></xref> constructor creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified page search cookie.
Specifies a cookie used for subsequent paged results search calls.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl.#ctor(System.Int32)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl"></xref> class using the requested page size.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl.Cookie"></xref> property specifies the page search cookie used for subsequent paged results search calls.
The page search cookie used for subsequent paged results search calls.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl.GetValue"></xref> method returns the page size and cookie associated with this control.
The page size and cookie associated with this control.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl.PageSize"></xref> property specifies the requested page size.
